name: standpipe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK a vertical pipe that is connected to a water supply and provides drinking water: The nearest clean water was from the standpipe in the churchyard. We all had to go and draw out our own drinking water from this one standpipe.
US a vertical pipe that is connected to a water supply and provides water to a public place such as a building or bridge, and that is used when there is a fire: A broken standpipe denied water to firefighters. In New York City, all standpipe systems must be inspected every five years.
